task: Insert the contents of a document
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Text' group, click on the 'Object' button.
From the drop-down menu, select 'Text from File'.
Navigate to the location of the document you want to insert.
Select the document file and click on the 'Insert' button.
The contents of the selected document will be inserted into your current document.
